originalText.text: RiteCheck is great for the neighborhood, great service, clean and bright.  I'm so glad to be able to utilize this place for many reasons.  For example money orders, and many other banking needs.  I don't know what the community would do without this branch.  Last but not least Maria is the best, she's smart and very professional.  Thanks Maria.

originalText.text:
This Rite Check at 2533 Frederick Douglas Blvd. is the best Check Cashing place in Harlem. It is always clean and the Employees are always courteous. It is a pleasure to do business at this location. They are definitely Community oriented and Maria is especially helpful and committed to the Harlem community. Her staff is a reflection great managerial talent.
Kudos to this location!!!!!
Jackie Rowe Adams

originalText.text: Yes for customer service !! Yes for money orders and yes for bill pay  for utilities. The location is complete and is super convenient. The staff is super cool and super accommodating , especially the manager Maria.  I've been coming here for years and I'm still very pleased . I highly recommend and I would give 7 stars if it was allowed

originalText.text: The reps Tykel & Maria were both professional, patient & actually cared to help me. My transaction was easy to make. It's a clean space and they're very friendly!

originalText.text: I opened my account at this location when I went to the Chase across the street and found it closed. The rep was extremely kind and patient. It's a smaller facility yet professional and courteous.
